page.title: 03Tourism in Woburn 1
page.content: Tourists are mainly attracted to Woburn when visiting {Woburn Abbey} or the {Safari Park}. Many special events are arranged during the summer months. Nearby Woburn Golf Course is the venue for important{Golf Tournaments} which attract some of the leading celebrities.{Woburn}itself depends on the tourist trade for its survival. The buildings which are mainly {Georgian,}are well preserved and very attractive.{Hanging baskets}and{window {boxes}are used to great effect. The Market Square and some of the pavements have{cobbled}areas.The shops in Woburn cater for tourists. There are craft shops, tea shops, a reject china shop, several art galleries and stylish boutiques. The shops are open on Sundays and accept credit cards. Morning coffee, lunch and dinner are readily available ( see{Lifestyle}).
